RyanTech Cloud Services is a growing and shining entity that is earning stripes from Microsoft and companies all over the globe with MS Partner of the Year status in 2014 and 2012. We are the Certified Technology Provider for Dealer.com on eMail and collaboration services. Ryantech Cloud Services is a Park City, Utah based, privately owned company, providing Microsoft Partner - Cloud Based Services and products specific to both small and medium based business as well as Fortune 500 customer technology solutions. We have attained both Gold and Silver level technical competencies.

Our vision is to offer earth grown supplementation, health & wellness education and a community for those looking to break free from harsh traditional methods.The Healthy Primate mission is to provide a natural path for people to achieve optimal performance both mentally and physically. We do this through the power of science and neurophysiology to provide healthy options from some of the earth’s oldest proven methods.We are dedicated to providing our clients with the highest quality supplementation, education and real world tactics aimed at helping people achieve their fullest potential.** A portion of our corner stone product, Stress Support sales goes into supporting P.T.S.D. research.You can learn more by visiting www.thehealthyprimate.org

As veterans in the hosting industry, UK2 Group have been providing internet services on a global scale for over 15 years, pioneering the mass adoption of many breakthrough technologies. With experience which spans two decades, we have seen the online landscape alter beyond recognition, and have adapted our service offering in accordance with the rapid developments in hardware capabilities, data transfer speeds and global business demands.Today, UK2 Group comprises seven unique brands, each of which caters to a specific audience. In our brand repertoire we have both technical and mass-market facing enterprises, each provisioning hosting excellence to their individual client bases. The group operates out of UK, US and Ukraine offices, based in London, Logan and Lviv respectively. With over 250 staff and a collective customer base totaling over a million, UK2 Group are able to cater for any enterprise large or small.Who is 100TB? 100TB is a leading provider of innovative high performance business infrastructure solutions. We operate on a global scale by storing and serving data from 23 locations around the world. We own and operate five world-class data centers in Amsterdam, London, Los Angeles, New York City and Salt Lake City. In partnership with SoftLayer, we are able to deliver a global reach with a further 18 data center  locations.
Senior Sales Engineer, Named Accounts, Service Provider Specialist

Part of core team built to support cloud and service providers as a dedicated vertical. Responsibilities include technical and sales functions for data center products for a named account set. Responsibility ranging from Networking, Server/ Compute & Storage understandings to assist clients in optimizing new and existing infrastructure.Managing a consistent budget of $60M + annually. This is a combination of new and existing enterpriseclients• Other responsibilities include certification & development of technical products across the data center on a quarterly basis.• My role operates cross-functionally with sales, finance, & Executive teams.• Managed the implementation & strategy for named account set specific to the Dell Enterprise Group product sets (Servers, Storage & Networking).

The Fiesta Bowl believes in the importance of community outreach and service. Through our involvement and contributions to charitable groups, we have upheld our commitment of annually supporting organizations devoted to enhancing our community.It has been a pleasure to be part of the team recently awarding $401,000 to 23 Arizona charities.The grants provide funding  for projects including job training, physical-fitness and health initiatives for children. Grants were restricted to 501(c)(3) organizations, with applications divided into four categories: youth, sports, education and human services.Recipients included the Barrow Neurological Institute and Arizona Recreation Center for the Handicapped.In the last 17 months, we have awarded more than $2.2million in grants to organizations across the state.

I truly believe that we need to invest, enable and support our youth. Junior Achievement of Arizona has been educating K-12 students about entrepreneurship, work readiness, and financial literacy since 1957. We will engage over 90,000 students in Junior Achievement of Arizona programs. Our economic success is wholly dependent on an educated workforce. Our Mission and Our Vision: - To inspire and prepare young people to succeed in a global economy.- To be recognized by businesses, educators and policy makers around the world as the premier organization for inspiring and preparing young people to become successful, contributing members of the global society; and for uniting people of all nations around the common goals of creating jobs, building stable economies, and providing higher standards of living.Our Core Values:- Belief in the boundless potential of young people- Commitment to the principles of market based economics and entrepreneurship- Passion for what we do and honesty, integrity and excellence in how we do it- Respect for the talents, creativity, perspectives, and backgrounds of all individuals- Belief in the power of partnership and collaboration- Conviction in the educational and motivational impact of relevant, hands-on learning

summary: We are born to live, love and experience the amazing things that this life has to offer. Over the past 20 years I have had an awesome career, traveled the world, built teams, helped clients and had fun in the process. I share stories, articles and pieces from life as business and family seem to blend more and more in today's work landscape. There is no such thing as the mythical "work life balance". When you do what you love - it's just a step in the journey.
